publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1592 Mike Watson: Budget (Scotland) (No.2) Bill—That the Finance Committee considers the Budget (Scotland) (No.2) Bill at Stage 2 in the following order: each section and schedule in order; and that each schedule is considered immediately after the section that introduces it.

S1M-1592 Mike Watson: Budget (Scotland) (No.2) Bill—That the Finance Committee considers the Budget (Scotland) (No.2) Bill at Stage 2 in the following order: each section and schedule in order; and that each schedule is considered immediately after the section that introduces it.
S1M-1592 Budget (Scotland) (No.2) Bill (lodged on 25 January 2001) Tommy Sheridan*
